{{Infobox Berry |name = Kelpsy |image = [[File:Kelpsy.png]] |caption = This Berry can be eaten as is or boiled to obtain an extract that adds a dash of flavor to food. |growtime = 1h 40m 0s |harvest = 21 berries |replant = 20% |points = 525 ||flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Kelpsy''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Persim]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 4 minutes || 33 minutes 20 seconds || 56 minutes 40 seconds || 1 hour 40 minutes - 3 hours 20 minutes |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kelpsy berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] || || || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || |- | || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] || || || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] |} {{Berries}}
